dict.acceptation: 使人兴奋的，令人激动的；

sent.orig: I find life an exciting business ------ and most exciting when it is lived for others.
sent.trans: 我发现生活是令人激动的事情，尤其是为别人活着时。

sent.orig: Although it asas sprinter as exciting, exciting, but it definitely makes moving more than sprint.
sent.trans: 它虽然不如短跑那样让人兴奋，令人激动，但是绝对比短跑更加让人感动。

sent.orig: I find life an exciting business and most exciting when it is lived for others.
sent.trans: 我发现生活是令人激动的事情，尤其是为别人活着时。（美国作家海伦·凯勒）

sent.orig: It was so exciting to meet her again after so many years.
sent.trans: 许多年过后，我再见到她时心情非常激动。

sent.orig: Do you look back, your future roads are more exciting.
sent.trans: 不要回头看，前面的世界才更精彩。
